cards.title: Intro
cards.mid-text: This is the unofficial logo for JavaScript. Insert some witty commentary about JS here. Matthew please add details.
cards.post: We hope you enjoy the lesson!

cards.title: Hello, world!
cards.pre: The most simple thing to do in JavaScript coding is push data to the console.
cards.mid-text: The browser console is a useful tool to examine the state of a program as it's running. Let's use it!
cards.post: The code below prints "Hello, world!" to the console. Try editing it to print some other text!

cards.title: Conclusion
cards.mid-text: We wanted to make an example for the proposal document, but we have a size limit.
